channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 中国 1 月份房价降幅放缓，10 个月来首次出现改善迹象
item.description: China’s home prices declined at a slower pace in January in the first signs of improvement in 10 months trib.al/5YxTD8V

item.title: 中国央行旨在以出其不意的宽松政策打市场一个措手不及，从而从其政策行动中榨取更多价值
item.description: China’s central bank is aiming to squeeze more value out of its policy actions by catching markets unaware with surprise easing trib.al/kg45CgS

item.title: 海外投资者对印度的资产表现出浓厚的兴趣，即使他们没有在印度交易的许可证或实体机构，也在代理接触印度的资产。
item.description: Overseas investors are showing such keen interest in India assets that they are taking proxy exposure to the country, even if they don’t have the license or physical presence to trade there trib.al/DwqKqfb

item.title: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，新西兰政府的目标仍然是在 2027 年之前使预算恢复盈余，但在经济疲软的情况下，这一目标变得更具挑战性。
item.description: New Zealand’s government is still aiming to bring its budget back into surplus by 2027 but the goal has become more challenging in a weakening economy, Finance Minister Nicola Willis said trib.al/R6OdRdy

item.title:
新消息：马航MH370客机神秘失踪十年后，防止类似事件再次发生的工作进展缓慢，令人痛心。以下是客机可能再次消失的原因。
阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: Ten years after MH370 disappeared mysteriously, efforts to prevent a similar case have been painfully slow. Here's why a passenger jet could vanish again.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ trib.al/MqwOJfD

item.title: 英国 2 月份消费者信心指数回落，表明家庭尚未准备好大肆挥霍
item.description: UK consumer confidence slipped back in February, suggesting households are not ready to splash out trib.al/wR3SQYm

item.title: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，1 月份消费者物价飙升，在决定何时开始降息时应谨慎行事。
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said January’s jump in consumer prices warrants caution in deciding when to start cutting interest rates trib.al/AwPisNC

item.title: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）表示，金融市场低估了全球政治和社会动荡的风险，他说："世界有可能会进入一个秩序意识淡薄的时期"。
item.description: Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers says financial markets are underestimating risks of global political and social tumult, saying the "world is potentially headed into a period where there is less of a sense of what the order is going to be" trib.al/5u4ZHBj

item.title: 据美国证券交易委员会称，一名得克萨斯州男子通过非法交易其妻子与英国石油公司同事的谈话内容，获利近 200 万美元。
item.description: A Texas man made almost $2 million by illegally trading on his wife’s conversations with her BP colleagues, according to the US SEC trib.al/WiHPzvP

item.title: 富达国际（Fidelity International）的一位基金经理卖出了他所监管基金中的绝大部分美国国债，因为他预期世界最大经济体仍有扩张空间
item.description: A Fidelity International money manager has sold the vast majority of US Treasuries from funds he oversees on expectations the world’s biggest economy still has room to expand trib.al/F7RVz9t

item.title: 泰国选美比赛主办方的重力集会最终因担心估值过高而渐趋平息
item.description: A gravity-defying rally in Thailand’s beauty-pageant organizer is finally seen petering out on concerns that the valuation has become overstretched trib.al/Mofg2Uw

item.title: 乌克兰与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成初步协议，释放 156 亿美元贷款的一部分，以加强乌克兰的预算
item.description: Ukraine and the IMF reached a preliminary agreement to unlock part of a $15.6 billion loan to strengthen the country’s budget trib.al/VVJfVxA

item.title: 埃利奥特在 2017 年将目标对准了潘兴广场，当时保罗-辛格的公司私下试图迫使同为激进分子的比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）清算其上市公司
item.description: Elliott targeted Pershing Square in 2017, when Paul Singer’s firm privately tried to force fellow activist Bill Ackman to liquidate his listed company trib.al/ZIppYjF

item.title: 以下是有关石油市场的最新消息和分析
item.description: Here’s the latest news and analysis on the oil market trib.al/Yum3kwt

item.title: 美国和中国正在讨论防止新兴市场主权违约浪潮的新措施，这是多年来这对超级大国在经济合作方面最重要的尝试之一
item.description: The US and China are discussing new measures to prevent a wave of emerging market sovereign defaults in one of the most significant attempts in years at economic cooperation between the rival superpowers trib.al/5E5m7lr

item.title: RT by @markets：台积电将于本周六正式启用其在日本的第一座工厂，使其有望在今年晚些时候开始量产。通过 @6d6f636869 深入了解日本如何在国内生产更多芯片的竞争中取得早期胜利。
item.description:
TSMC will officially open its first Japan fab on Saturday, putting it on track to begin mass production later this year. Here's a deep dive into how Japan pulled off an early victory in the race to make more chips domestically via @6d6f636869
bloomberg.com/news/articles/…

item.title: 两位美联储高官周四明确表示，美国央行今年仍将降息，只是时间不会太快
item.description: Two top Fed officials hammered home the message Thursday that the US central bank is still on track to cut interest rates this year — just not anytime soon trib.al/CRENh9y

item.title:
-月球着陆尝试 -德国国内生产总值 -欧盟财长会议 -拜登将公布制裁措施 -华纳兄弟财报
值得关注
item.description:
-Moon landing attempt
-Germany GDP
-EU Finance Ministers meet
-Biden to unveil sanctions
-Warner Brothers Earnings

Here's what to watch trib.al/nS9Wa6D

item.title: #5Things：围绕英伟达（Nvidia）大涨的兴奋情绪蔓延整个市场，美联储官员警告不要过早降息，中国的量化对冲基金承认前所未有的失败。以下是市场动向。
item.description: #5Things: Euphoria surrounding Nvidia’s blistering rally spreads across markets, Federal Reserve officials warn against cutting rates too soon, and quant hedge funds in China are admitting to unprecedented failures. Here’s what’s moving markets. trib.al/uO6BcTD

item.title:
RT by @markets: 今日必读 👷🏼‍♂️美制造业强势增长 📈英伟达市值暴增破美股纪录 🚗中国电动车需求放缓

item.title: 新加坡欲逮捕去年出人意料收购曼联的芬兰企业家
item.description: Singapore seeks to arrest Finnish entrepreneur who made a surprise bid for Manchester United last year trib.al/5Dnl7RX

item.title: 从税收到支出和增长预测，以下是南非财政部长戈东瓦纳的预算要点
item.description: From taxes to spending and growth forecasts, here are the highlights of South African Finance Minister Godongwana’s budget trib.al/aCr01qK

item.title: 自 2 月份开始加息以来，最大私募股权公司的收益率骤降 49
item.description: Payouts from the biggest private equity firms plummet 49% since the Feb began raising interest rates trib.al/ANu9xzR

item.title: 南非将发布一份由德国专家编写的关于国家公用事业公司 Eskom 旗下燃煤发电厂状况的报告
item.description: South Africa will release a report on the state of coal-fired power plants owned by state utility Eskom that was prepared by German experts trib.al/IBpuSTu

item.title: 根据《预算审查》，国家财政部通过从黄金和外汇应急储备账户提款，降低了借款需求总额
item.description: National Treasury lowers gross borrowing requirement through drawdown from the Gold and Foreign Exchange Contingency Reserve Account, according to the Budget Review trib.al/VRcuf3T

item.title: @CrowleyKev 写道：圭亚那的国库将迎来大量石油财富，但总统伊尔法安-阿里正在寻找原油以外的其他用途。
item.description: Guyana's coffers are set for an influx of oil wealth, but President Irfaan Ali is looking beyond crude to spend it, writes @CrowleyKev trib.al/aMoxHz1

item.title: 兰特走强，因为南非表示将动用中央银行的应急储备金，降低政府的债务轨迹和借贷要求
item.description: The rand strengthens as South Africa said it will tap the central bank’s contingency reserves, lowering the government’s debt trajectory and borrowing requirements trib.al/zhypjiU

item.title: RT by @markets：爆料：南非表示将动用央行应急储备金，降低借贷要求，导致兰特跳水
item.description: BREAKING: Rand jumps after South Africa says it will tap the central bank’s contingency reserves, lowering borrowing requirements trib.al/lQfkSsI

item.title: 南非国库计划引入新的财政锚，为公共财政提供可持续的长期发展道路
item.description: South Africa’s National Treasury plans to introduce a new fiscal anchor to provide a sustainable long-term path for public finances trib.al/I72T2zK

item.title:
投资者正在寻找创造性的方式投资 SpaceX，押注星链公司最终的首次公开募股。
在本期《埃隆公司》播客节目中，@EdLudlow 谈到了 SpaceX 的员工并不是唯一持有公司股票的人。
item.description:
Investors are finding creative ways to invest in SpaceX, betting on an eventual Starlink IPO.

On this episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, @EdLudlow talks about how SpaceX's employees aren't the only ones holding stock in the company trib.al/Rd8RgPG
